examples.korean: We have greatly appreciated being your subcontractor for the past three years and look forward to continuing to work with CBC. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당사는 지난 3년 동안 귀사의 하청업체로 일한 것을 감사히 여기며 앞으로도 계속 CBC 사와 함께 일하길 기대합니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: We have greatly appreciated being your subcontractor for the past three years and look forward to continuing to work with CBC. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Her father kept making disparaging remarks about him. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 아버지는 그를 못마땅하게 여기며 계속 흠을 잡았다. Neungyule

examples.korean: Nowadays, most ginseng is cultivated but wild ginseng, known also as "mountain ginseng," is still highly regarded and very expensive. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 요즘은 인삼을 대부분 인공으로 재배하기 때문에 자연생 인삼인 ''산삼''을 귀한 것으로 여기며 값도 아주 비싸다. Neungyule
examples.english: Nowadays, most ginseng is cultivated but wild ginseng, known also as "mountain ginseng," is still highly regarded and very expensive. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She kept making disparaging remarks about Karen. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 여자는 카렌을 못마땅하게 여기며 계속 헐뜯었다. Neungyule
examples.english: She kept making disparaging remarks about Karen. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I will think of his sons as my sons, and will teach them to be doctors if they wish, and I shall expect no payment from them. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 아들들을 내 아들처럼 여기며 그들이 원하면 의술을 가르치고, 어떤 대가도 바라지 않겠습니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I will think of his sons as my sons, and will teach them to be doctors if they wish, and I shall expect no payment from them. Add to Wordbook
